title: Asterix Megaslap v1.2.1
description:
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 50 BC and the whole of Gaul is occupied by the RomansÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ The whole of it? Not quite! A village inhabited by indomitable Gauls still continues to and always will resist the invader.

MEGAPUNCH
One swallow of magic potion and throw your roman away as far as possible.

THEYÃ¢â‚¬â„¢RE CRAZY THESE ROMANS
Unlock more than 20 objects (helmet, cloak, helium, etc.) and characters (Obelix, Dogmatix and other legionaries) which will help send your Roman further and further away.

THE WORLD OF ASTERIX
Travel through the most emblematic countries from the adventures of Asterix, from the Gaul village to Egypt via the Compendium Roman camp, Lutetia and, of course, RomeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and not forgetting the pirates, by Jove!

SIMPLE AND FUN
Asterix Megapunch is intended for Gauls of all ages. Fire up AsterixÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fist by twirling your finger before aiming it at your Roman to send him flying straightaway.

COLLECT THE ASTERIX CHARACTERS
Collect the 30 Asterix character cards by picking them up during the levels or swapping them with your friends. Caesar will be happy to tell you their story.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
Take on your friends. Their records are depicted as Romans inflated with helium that you will encounter on your journey.

What's New:

- Fixed a crash for players with a great number of Facebook friends.
